name: consovas
description:
The canvas consists of cells 21x15. It almost looks like a square if you enable Point Font in the console settings.

# Is a kind of wall that the player builds.

O is the player himself.

Build, animate, play!

All actions in the game are performed by commands. A bunch of commands is called a code. Commands

"w", "a", "s" and "d" is movement Up, Left, Down and Right

"W", "A", "S" and "D" build walls around the player

P - detailed help on the website (ru)
wasd - move Up, Left, Down, Right
WASD - build or destroy on the sides of the player like "wasd"
1-9 - teleport to the sides and corners
v - get the action code
r - redraw
b - redraw without writing to the code
h - hide the actions
u - unhide the actions
c - reset screen
C - clear the code
| - pause 50 milliseconds
_ - pause 500 milliseconds
x - quit

b - back to game
